metadata.Title: CVE-2018-13440 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: The audiofile Audio File Library 0.3.6 has a NULL pointer dereference bug in ModuleState::setup in modules/ModuleState.cpp, which allows an attacker to cause a denial of service via a crafted caf file, as demonstrated by sfconvert.

notes.Note: ebarretto> It looks like upstream is not active anymore, some of the open CVEs have a proposed fix on a fork. Marking as deferred for now.

criterions.comment: audiofile package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.3.6-5').
